featured.text: The 1962 celebration "was more enthusiastic -- a lot more people," said one spectator, who as a young newlywed attended Glenn’s first parade and came from her Brooklyn home again for Glenn’s second parade.

definition.zh_def: 布魯克林是美國紐約市的一個區，位於長島的西部，以其多元文化和藝術場景而聞名。
definition.en_def: Brooklyn is a borough of New York City located on the western end of Long Island, known for its diverse culture and vibrant arts scene.
definition.example: I visited Brooklyn last weekend and enjoyed the local food and art galleries.
